channel.title: Open Source on sudo rem
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on sudo rem

item.title: The XZ Backdoor Dilemma
item.description: There’s a lot of information floating around right now on the xz backdoor.

item.title: Discord Engagement
item.description: Discord is the most populated live chat interaction platform on the internet. Let’s take some time to discuss how we could use that to engage open source communities and enterprise user bases more effectively, and discuss some of the public perceptions that surround Discord.
